review: The treatment was very relaxed which took away the usual tension experienced in a dental chair. The treatment was gentle but professional. The assistants were very attentive to my needs. My teeth now feel clean and smooth. I was also given advice on interdental cleaning.

the problem was solved and was very comfortable after the treatment. 
during the treatment there was minimum pain .
Dr's hand was very soft .
Thankyou Dr Nehal !!!
